column5: After the shut out on friday, and the slow bite on saturday, i almost hung up my rods for good.I get frustrated easily Went on a nice brunch cruise with the wife,good eats and a nice tour around the Port of Montreal.    Relaxed in the afternoon, and the wife said 'Lets go Fishing' Got on the water by 6. Cruised to our little spot, and Bang !!!Nice SMB !! The wife caught it, it jumped and the line wrapped around her rod. I was up front, and all i saw was the rod landing on the floor, and my wife pullin the line up, hand over hand .She caught the bugger by hand It was priceless, but she still wouldnt touch the fish for a picture  We started catching perch, and rock bass with every cast.Caught a couple more very small SMB, and then this guy hit my spinner.   It was crazy. Everytime i got it near the net, it tore off 30-40 feet of line.Finally got it into the boat. All in all, we musta boated 30 fish in 3 hours A perfect way to end a perfect day.  Tite lines All !!!  Paul
Great report Paul good to see ya catching them !
More for the fish than me Ron.Dont want to unslime him, and sure dont want him slipping out and getting my boat all dirty Plus,makes it easier to Lip him.

Good haul! Did you think you had a monster walleye at first? Your lucky to have a wife who asks our favorite question "wanna go fishing?" I was in the bug infested bush for 8 hours with my gf, and for the most part she loves it BUT she WONT touch les poissons. Oh well haha
Well done Mr&Mrs Mecman  Fishing is like that a lot of patience and then KAOS  Gota love it!!    That is an OFC hat ? rite?
ah I miss home. Nice pics
sounds like it was a great day for you guys congrats to you and the wife Paul.
Congrats on the good fishing...  The walleye bite west of you guys has been unbelievable on the Larry this year... Give em a try
Great report, fish and pics Paul Doesn't get any better than that  Was that one of the spinners you made last winter in the pike's mouth??  If it is... AWESOME Thanks for sharing Jacques
Nice pike. Hummm, I have that same hat, what are the odds?
Mrs Mercman !!!  I should get her to sign up.  .......Maybe not
You and Barb did good. Congrats to you.
Nice way to spend Father's Day....good job....
Quality big pics. I like that sticker too... "take a fish boating."  Sounds like you and the Missus did well to take a school of them boating.
